text: Hi <@UUX58C0S3>, thanks! I sent you an email :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi,
I was directed here in the hopes that I may be able to get some help :slightly_smiling_face:

Currently we have around 22k worth of members that we're wanting to essential signup to our private content, they are already contacts within HubSpot, so we're targeting them with a workflow to send out an email informing them of their eligibility for our membership program.

However the current onBoarding process is ver clunky:
• *STEP1:* Email out informing people to register
• *STEP2*: Click email link and get taken to the self registration form
• *STEP3:* Fill out password
• *STEP4*: Check your inbox to Verify the same email you clicked the link from
• *STEP5:* login
Is there a way to use the same link token that gets used in registration email to skip STEP4?
In the template its {{ membership_registration_link }}, but I can't use it within a standard email template...

Has anyone come across this or found a workaround??
